mapper.select: SELECT mountain_num, mountain_name, mountain_height, mountain_local, mountain_content, mountain_image, mountain_great FROM mountain
mapper.insert: INSERT into mountain( mountain_num, mountain_name, mountain_height, mountain_local, mountain_content, mountain_image, mountain_great) VALUES( mountain_seq.nextval, #{mountainname}, #{mountainheight}, #{mountainlocal}, #{mountaincontent}, #{mountainimage}, #{mountaingreat} )
